Station Name (LEA): ALASKA DEPT OF PUBLIC SAFETY LEA
Justification: THIS IS FOR USE BY THE DEPT. OF PUBLIC SAFETY, ALASKA STATE TROOPERS.  THIS EQUIPMENT WILL BE UTILIZED TO MAINTAIN THE EMERGENCY RESPONSE AREAS USED BY EMERGENCY RESPONSE VEHICLES BY THE DEPT. IT WILL ENSURE ALL VEHICLES CAN EXIT THE POST FOR EMERGENCIES BY KEEPING THE LOTS, GARAGE EXITS AND DISPATCH AREA LOTS CLEAR FOR PROPER RESPONSES DURING INCLEMENT WEATHER DURING 9 MONTHS OF THE YEAR--WINTER CONDITIONS. THIS EQUIPMENT WILL KEEP ALL LOTS CLEAR OF ICE AND SNOW ENABLING EMERGENCY RESPONSES.

THE ALABAMA LAW ENFORCEMENT AGENCY CURRENTLY OPERATES A FLEET OF SEVEN OH58 HELICOPTERS.  THE UNIT SUPPORTS STATE, LOCAL AND FEDERAL AGENCIES IN A LAW ENFORCEMENT CAPACITY.  THESE AIRCRAFT ARE USED FOR SEARCHES FOR MISSING CHILDREN, MISSING ALZHEIMER'S PATIENTS, AND FLEEING FUGITIVES.  WE ALSO SUPPORT IN DRUG ERADICATION PROGRAMS AND HOMELAND SECURITY MISSIONS.  THIS PART WILL HELP CONTINUE TO SUSTAIN UNIT OPERATIONS FOR THE FUTURE.

ATHENS POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD USE THESE 27 M4 RIFLE BARRELS TO REDUCE THE OVERALL LENGTH OF OUR CURRENT 20 INCH M16S.  THIS BARREL SWAP WOULD MAKE OUR PATROL RIFLES EASIER TO STORE AND SAFER TO DEPLOY FROM THE LOCKED VERTICAL MOUNTS BETWEEN THE FRONT SEATS OF OUR PATROL CARS.

ATHENS POLICE DEPARTMENT WILL USE THESE THREE RIFLE STORAGE CASES TO SAFELY TRANSPORT RIFLES TO AND FROM THE RANGE FOR TRAINING.  WE MAY ALSO USE ONE OF THESE CASES TO TRANSPORT OUR HONOR GUARD LONG GUNS TO AND FROM CEREMONIAL DETAILS.  FINALLY, THESE CASES WOULD BE USED TO STORE RIFLES IN OUR ARMORY THAT HAVE NOT YET BEEN ISSUED.

THIS TRUCK WOULD BE USED FOR COMMUNICATION AND COMMAND POST FOR THE UNION COUNTY SHERIFFS DEPARTMENT . WE HAVE THE LARGEST COUNTY IN THE STATE OF ARKANSAS AND HAVE A LARGE WILDLIFE REFUGE WITHIN OUR COUNTY AND SEARCHES FOR LOST HUNTERS AND FISHERMAN ARE VERY FREQUENT. THE DRIVE TRAIN OF THIS TRUCK WOULD MAKE IT A VALUABLE ASSET FOR THE DEPARTMENT TO A REPEATER SYSTEM INTO THOSE AREAS FOR HANDHELD RADIOS THAT TO BE ABLE TO COMMUNICATE DURING SEARCHES.

THIS TRUCK WOULD BE USED BY THE UNION COUNTY SHERIFFS DEPARTMENT FOR THE TRANSPORT OF SUPPLIES AND OR PERSON IN AND OUT OF LOW LYING AREAS DURING FLOODS. UNION COUNTY IS THE LARGEST COUNTY IN THE STATE OF ARKANSAS AND HAS MANY AREAS IN ITS BORDERS THAT ARE PRONE TO FLOODING. THE DRIVE TRAIN OF THIS TRUCK WOULD MAKE THIS MUCH EASIER AND SAFER THAN THE EQUIPMENT THAT THE SHERIFFS DEPARTMENT IS NOW USING.

THIS POLICE DEPARTMENT IS THE LEAD AGENCY FOR THE TOWN WIDE EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT COUNCIL, AND THESE GENERATORS WILL BE USED TO PROVIDE BACK UP POWER TO THE POLICE HQ, POLICE GARAGE FOR FUEL DISTRIBUTION TO POLICE VEHICLES AND OUR STATIC EMERGENCY OPERATIONS CENTER AS WELL AS OUT MOBILE COMMAND POST. THEY WILL REPLACE, PREVIOUSLY GRANTED GENERATORS, WHICH HAVE OUTLIVED THEIR USEFULNESS AND ARE NO LONGER SERVICEABLE.
TO FACILITATE THE INSTALLATION OF POLICE DEPARTMENT SURVEILLANCE CAMERAS AND AUTOMATED LICENSE PLATE READING DEVICES, TO COMBAT DRUG TRAFFIC ALONG A MAJOR  WESTCHESTER COUNTY VEHICLE CORRIDOR.

THIS POLICE DEPARTMENT IS THE LEAD AGENCY IN THE TOWN WIDE EMERGENCY MANAGEMENT COUNCIL, AND WOULD USE THESE ITEMS TO PREPOSITION WATER THROUGHOUT THE MUNICIPALITY IN THE EVENT OF A NATURAL DISASTER WHICH RENDERS THE CURRENT WATER DISTRIBUTION SYSTEM INEFFECTIVE.

FOR USE BY THE MT. PLEASANT POLICE DEPARTMENT FOR THE INSTALLATION OF SURVEILLANCE CAMERAS AND AUTOMATED LICENSE PLATE READING SYSTEMS, AS WELL AS PUBLIC SAFETY MONITORING OF MAJOR INTERSECTIONS AND THOROUGHFARES IN THE TOWNSHIP.  OUR GEOGRAPHICAL TOWNSHIP CONTAINS A MAJOR CROSSROADS  OF  4 HIGH SPEED AVENUES OF APPROACH FOR NYC AND  AS SUCH, SEES A VERY HIGH INSTANCE OF CRIMINAL ACTIVITY, WHICH THESE ELECTRONIC MEASURES HELP TO COMBAT.
FOR USE AT THE POLICE DEPARTMENT FIREARMS TRAINING FACILITY TO STORE TARGETS AND SUPPLIES, OUT OF THE WEATHER, WHEN NOT IN USE.
FOR USE AT THE POLICE DEPARTMENT FIREARMS TRAINING FACILITY TO STORE TARGETS AND SUPPLIES, OUT OF THE WEATHER, WHEN NOT IN USE.
FOR USE BY THIS POLICE DEPARTMENT IN CONJUNCTION WITH NIGHT VISION EQUIPMENT AND OUR SURVEILLANCE EFFORTS  THROUGHOUT THE TOWNSHIP.
FOR USE BY THIS AGENCY FOR THE CONTAINMENT OF K-9 OFFICERS AS WELL AS IMPOUNDED ANIMALS.
FOR THE POLICE DEPARTMENT TO POWER COVERT SURVEILLANCE CAMERAS AND AUTOMATED LICENSE PLATE READERS

FOR THIS POLICE AGENCY TO IMPLEMENT A LARGE BUILD OUT OF AUTOMATED LICENSE PLATE READERS ON A MAJOR CONFLUENCE OF 3 HIGH SPEED AVENUES OF APPROACH, TO NYC IN CENTRAL WESTCHESTER COUNTY, NY,  TO COMBAT DRUG TRAFFIC AS WELL AS RANDOM CRIMINAL ACTIVITY.  THIS CABLE WITH A SIMILAR AMOUNT OF A PREVIOUS REQUEST SHOULD COMPLETE THE INSTALLATION OF THESE READERS.

COMPUTERS, AND THEREFORE MONITORS, ARE A CRUCIAL PART IN LAW ENFORCEMENT AND ARE NECESSARY FOR ALL ASPECTS OF THE AGENCY.  DUE TO A CONTINUOUSLY DECREASING BUDGET FROM OUR COUNTY COMMISSIONERS, WE CANNOT BUY THE EQUIPMENT WE NEED.  THIS WILL ASSIST US IN THE DAY TO DAY ACTIVITIES TO PROTECT THE PUBLIC.

OUR PATROL VEHICLES ARE BEING EQUIPPED WITH LESS LETHAL IMPACT GUNS FOR A REDUCED FORCE RESPONSE TO PEOPLE IN CRISIS, MENTAL HEALTH AND VULNERABLE CHILDREN AND ADULTS. THE LESS LETHAL DO NOT HAVE OPTICS, OUTFITTING THEM WITH OPTICS WILL ENHANCE ACCURACY AND A POSITIVE OUTCOME.

COMPUTER MONITORS WILL BE USED BY PERSONNEL OF THE WESTPORT POLICE DEPARTMENT WHILE VIEWING AND WRITING REPORTS, EMAILS, DISPATCH CALLS AND RESEARCH ON THE INTERNET FOR ITEMS OR INFORMATION USED WHILE IN THE PERFORMANCE OF THEIR DUTIES.
ENVELOPES WILL BE USED TO FOR MAILING OF OFFICIAL DOCUMENTS PRODUCED BY THE WESTPORT POLICE DEPARTMENT
TOWELS WILL BE USED FOR CLEANING AND STERILIZING THE INTERIOR AREA OF THE POLICE DEPARTMENT AND FOR THE MAINTENANCE AND STERILIZATION OF THE WESTPORT POLICE FLEET.

GLOVES WILL BE USED BY MEMBERS OF THE WESTPORT POLICE DEPARTMENT AS A BARRIER TO BARE SKIN WHEN DEALING WITH THE BODILY FLUIDS OF OTHERS. GLOVES WILL ALSO BE USED TO KEEP HANDS CLEAN WHEN DEALING WITH OBJECTS THAT ARE UNSANITARY OR GRIMY.

LIGHTS WILL BE USED DURING NATURAL DISASTERS SUCH AS EARTHQUAKES, TSUNAMIS, AND HIGH WINDS WHEN GRID POWER IS OUT OF SERVICE. LIGHTS WILL BE SET UP TO RUN ON EMERGENCY POWER GENERATORS AND WILL BE USED IN TENTS AND BUILDINGS THAT ARE STILL BEING USED AS EMERGENCY SHELTERS, OPERATIONS CENTERS, AND COMMAND POSTS.
THE LIGHT WOULD BE USED BY THE DEPUTIES AT THE YAKIMA COUNTY SHERIFF'S OFFICE FOR EVIDENCE SEARCHES, SAR MISSIONS, EMERGENCIES AND HIDA ENFORCEMENT EMPHASIS.

THESE SCANNERS WILL BE USED BY OUR TROOPERS TO SCAN LETTERS, CRIMINAL INVESTIGATIVE REPORTS AND TRAFFIC CRASH REPORTS.  THEY WILL ALSO BE USED TO SCAN AND SEND VARIOUS REPORTS THROUGH EMAIL.  ALSO, USED FOR DISCOVERY TO THE PROSECUTORS OFFICE FOR CRIMINAL PROSECUTION.

THIS ITEM WILL BE USED FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT PURPOSES. THIS WILL ALLOW OUR OFFICERS AND MECHANICS TO PERFORM GENERAL MAINTENANCE TO OUR OFFICE AND VEHICLES. WE CURRENTLY HAVE TO BORROW TOOLS OR USE OUR OWN TO PERFORM ANY WORK.

THIS ITEM WOULD BE USED FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT PURPOSE. THIS WOULD ALLOW THE WHITESVILLE POLICE DEPARTMENT TO ISSUE OUR OFFICERS A POUCH TO HAVE WHILE ON DUTY ALLOWING THEM TO CARRY EXTRA MAGAZINES FOR THEIR PATROL RIFLE.

THIS ITEM WOULD BE USED FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT PURPOSE. THE WHITESVILLE POLICE DEPARTMENT WOULD ISSUE THIS TO ALLOW OUR OFFICERS TO CARRY EXTRA EQUIPMENT ON DUTY. WITH OUR MOUNTAINOUS TERRAIN  LIMITED MANPOWER  AND POTENTIAL DELAY IN BACKUP OUR OFFICERS HAVE THE POTENTIAL TO BE BY THEMSELVES FOR UP TO AN HOUR. THIS WOULD POTENTIALLY KEEP THEM SAFE AND ALLOW THEM TO RETURN HOME TO THEIR FAMILIES WITH MORE EQUIPMENT AND WEAPONS AVAILABLE AT THEIR DISPOSAL.
THIS ITEM WILL BE USED FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT PURPOSE. OUR OFFICERS CURRENTLY CARRY THEIR OWN PATROL RIFLE WHILE ON DUTY AND THIS WOULD ALLOW US TO PROVIDE THEM WITH A QUALITY OPTIC FOR THEIR RIFLE.

THIS WILL BE USED FOR LAW ENFORCEMENT PURPOSE. WITH A TIGHTENED BUDGET THIS WILL ALLOW OUR OFFICERS TO PERFORM UNDERCOVER DRUG STINGS, COVERT VIDEO SURVEILLANCE, AND ALLOW US TO CONCEAL OUR OFFICERS IN PLAIN VIEW OF THE SUSPECTS. THIS WILL ALLOW US TO NOT HAVE TO RELY ON OUR DRUG TASK FORCE FOR EQUIPMENT (WHICH THEY SOMETIMES NEVER SHOW UP).

FOR TRANSPORT AND PROTECTION OF OUR MULTI-JURISDICTION EMERGENCY RESPONSE TEAM.THIS TEAM IS BASED OUT OF THIS AGENCY AND COVERS A TRI-COUNTY AREA INCLUDING WASHAKIE COUNTY, HOT SPRINGS COUNTY AND BIG HORN COUNTY.THE VEHICLE WILL BE USED BY THIS AGENCY TO SAFELY TRANSPORT TEAM MEMBERS TO SCENES INVOLVING TERRORIST INCIDENTS, ACTIVE THREATS TO PUBLIC AND LAW ENFORCEMENT SAFETY, ACTIVE SHOOTER INCIDENTS AND AS A RESCUE VEHICLE FOR INJURED CITIZENS OR OFFICERS DURING CRITICAL INCIDENTS.
